Package punktiert.physics

Interface Summary
BehaviorInterface abstract interface for implementing particle behaviors implement this interface for any new behavior by Karsten Schmidt: toxi.physics.behaviors.ParticleBehavior
 

Class Summary
BAlign Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; Alignment algorythm based on: Craig Reynold's Boids program to simulate the flocking behavior of birds.
BAttraction basic Attractor class, based on toxi.physics.behaviors.AttractionBehavior by Karsten Schmidt applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BAttractionLocal Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors add the Behavior to the VParticle.behaviors; applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle;
BCohesion Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors cohesion algorythm based on: Craig Reynold's Boids program to simulate the flocking behavior of birds.
BCollision Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors VParticle.neighbors gets automatically updated; selects neighbors in Range: VPhysics.hashGrid.Radius addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; call each timeStep Collision Detection based on the VParticle.radius
BCollisionGroup Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors whereas excludes with sprigs connected particles VParticle.neighbors gets automatically updated; selects neighbors in Range: VPhysics.hashGrid.Radius addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; call each timeStep Collision Detection based on the VParticle.radius
BConstantForce applies a force to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BSeek Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; call each timeStep Seek algorythm based on: Craig Reynold's Boids program to simulate the flocking behavior of birds.
BSeparate Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; seperation algorythm based on: Craig Reynold's Boids program to simulate the flocking behavior of birds.
BSwarm Local Particle Behavior: compares the passed in Particle to its own list of neighbors addBehavior to the VParticle.behaviors; swarm / flock algorythm based on: Craig Reynold's Boids program to simulate the flocking behavior of birds.
BVortex basic Attractor class, based on toxi.physics.behaviors.AttractionBehavior by Karsten Schmidt applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BWander basic wander-algorythm
BWorldBox can be used as a framing wrap- or bouncing box for your physics engine or VParticle for convinience use one of the VPhysics constructors
ConstraintNail  
VBoid An example how you can set up your own agent by combining/ implementing different beaviors.
VParticle An individual 3D particle for use by the VPhysics and VSpring classes. the functionality can be extended by applying different behaviors this class is more or less an modification/ extension of Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPartcle class
VParticleGroup container for VParticle Groups
VParticleString Utility builder/grouping/management class to connect a set of particles into a physical string/thread.
VPhysics A particle physics engine using Verlet integration based on: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verlet_integration http://www.teknikus.dk/tj/gdc2001.htm this class is more or less an modification/ extension of Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPhysics class, http://toxiclibs.org ; for convenience combined physics for 2D / 3D; some addons for speed; and extended behaviors Written by Daniel Koehler - 2012 www.lab-eds.org for feedback please contact me at: daniel@lab-eds.org
VPhysicsSimple particle physics engine using Verlet integration based on: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verlet_integration http://www.teknikus.dk/tj/gdc2001.htm this class is more or less an modification/ extension of Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPhysics class, http://toxiclibs.org ; for convenience combined physics for 2D / 3D; some addons for speed; and extended behaviors Written by Daniel Koehler - 2012 www.lab-eds.org for feedback please contact me at: daniel@lab-eds.org
VSpring A spring class connecting two VParticles in space.
VSpringAnchor Implements a string which will only enforce its rest length, if the current distance from the original position is MORE than its rest length.
VSpringMaxDistance Implements a string which will only enforce its rest length if the current distance is MORE than its rest length.
VSpringMinDistance Implements a string which will only enforce its rest length if the current distance is LESS than its rest length.
VSpringRange Implements a string which will only enforce its rest length if the current distance is not between the MIN and MAX range.
VTrail adds the passed in VParticle to the List: Trail.particles; records a "Trail" of the particle (head) movement connected to the VParticle instance;
